characteristics.name: Flow
characteristics.description: Water moves around obstacles, always finding its path, unstoppable yet gentle

characteristics.name: Emotion
characteristics.description: The fluid realm of feelings, tears, and the subconscious mind

characteristics.name: Life Source
characteristics.description: Essential to all living beings, the first medium of existence

characteristics.name: Purification
characteristics.description: Cleansing waters that wash away sin, illness, and impurity

characteristics.name: Adaptability
characteristics.description: Taking the shape of any container, existing in multiple forms

characteristics.name: Depth
characteristics.description: Mysterious abysses hiding unknown secrets and ancient powers

characteristics.name: Destruction
characteristics.description: Floods, storms, and tsunamis that obliterate everything

characteristics.name: Fertility
characteristics.description: Rivers nourishing fields, rain bringing growth and abundance

characteristics.name: Memory
characteristics.description: Waters holding the history of all that has dissolved within them

characteristics.name: Threshold
characteristics.description: Rivers and seas as boundaries between worlds, realms, and states of being
